5 reasons e-money adoption is growing:
https://t.co/QnwX4zxJsI

1. Convenience
2. Ubiquity
3. Complementarity
4. Trust

#Vietnam’s economy is shining, fiscal and financial resilience improving. Public debt declined four percentage points of GDP in the last three years. Banks are being strengthened and institutions of macroeconomic management modernized. Check out the report https://t.co/W7k2tQYVwh
